page.title: 06Industry in Montrose.
page.content: As well as the new oil related industries on the Industrial Estate to the east of the A937,there are local {family firms}as well, one of which is James Mills Ltd.They{process scrap metal,about 5,000 tonnes of steel each month, as well as hiring out heavy plant.Burness and Son Ltd. have been {building contractors}in the town for 47 years and employ 120 men. Montrose Cement Castings also make a range of {cement products}from pipes to blocks. {Timber}is processed by the sawmill at Brownlee Ltd.having been imported from the Baltic countries to be used in the construction industry.Sportworks Ltd. {make playing fields,}lay sewers and roads as well as hard landscaping. eg. new Town Square in Montrose.Montrose Commercial Motors Ltd.also repair and service light and{heavy vehicles}for their roadworthiness.{
